name: Donut Mania
description:
Ever wanted to know what it feels like to be a donut? Or have an infinite supply of energy drinks? Say no more! Donut Mania is a fun little game where you get to experience this and a lot some more. Collect the blue cans, dodge the red ones and become the top dog donut!

Music credits:

Three Chain Links – Drive Fast, Dance Hard

Holiznacc0 – Decent Person
